hesml.measures.impl

Class MeasureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.measures.impl.MeasureFactory

  • public class MeasureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The aim of this class is to instantiate all the similarity measures in order to hide the implementation classes to the client code.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-DÃ­az

        public static ISimilarityMeasure getConstrainedTaiebMeasure(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                            int maxSynsetsNumberPerWord)

        This function creates an instance of the Taieb constrained similarity measure, which corresponds to the second measure introduced in the following paper. Hadj Taieb, M. A., Ben Aouicha, M., and Ben Hamadou, A. (2014). Ontology-based approach for measuring semantic similarity. Engineering Applications of Artificial Intelligence, 36, 238â261.

      • getMeasure

        public static ISimilarityMeasure getMeasure(IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                            ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                            SimilarityMeasureType measureType)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates an instance of an specific similarity measure. The only aim of this function is to allow the unified creation of the Taieb2014sim2 similarity measure with the remaining measures during the loading process of the MultipleDatasetsExperiment. Unlike the remaining similarity measures, the Taieb2014sim2 similarity measure requires the maximum number of synsets per word in addition to the base taxonomy. For this reason, this function defines an instance of the WordNetDB as input parameter. Currently, this function is only invoked by the MultipleDatasetsExperiment in order to reproduce the results reported in table 4 of our paper below. Lastra-DÃ­az, J. J., and GarcÃ­a-Serrano, A. (2015). A novel family of IC-based similarity measures with a detailed experimental survey on WordNet. Engineering Applications of Artificial Intelligence Journal, 46, 140â153.
        Parameters:
        wordnet -
        taxonomy -
        measureType -
        Returns:
        A similarity measure.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
